resource_explanation:
User registration API.

Users attributes :

  - `email` - Represents email that was used to register a user in the application(unique in application scope).
  - `username` - Used as user name.
  - `admin` - `false` if regular user `true`, if the user has access to application settings.
  - `confirmed` - `false` if the user did not confirm his address otherwise `true`.
  - timestamps

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Unique email that used to identify user in application

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password that the user uses to log in

parameters.name: password_confirmation
parameters.description: Password duplicate. Used to prevent typos when entering a password
